aria-activedescendant.description: The ID of the currently active descendant element when the radio button is part of a group.

aria-describedby.description: The 'aria-describedby' attribute for the radio button

aria-expanded.description: Whether the radio button is expanded (true) or collapsed (false).

aria-invalid.description: Whether the radio button is invalid (true) or valid (false).

aria-label.description: Accessible label when control does not need to render label tag.

aria-labelledby.description: The 'aria-labelledby' attribute for the radio button

aria-owns.description: The IDs of the elements that are controlled by the radio button.

disabled.description: Whether the radio button is disabled (true) or enabled (false).

id.description: A unique identifier for the radio element.

label.description: The label of the radio item

value.description: The value of the native radio element.
